message: Bangladesh Watch Canada (BDWatch) and Jagroto Janota, Toronto organised a human chain at Regent park, Toronto today at 2-30pm 15th of December 2013,  against the recent judicial killing of Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami leader Shaeed Abdul Qader Mollah by the present Hasina-lead Government. The program was followed by Gaebana Janaza (funeral prayer in absentia) for Shaheed Molla and all died in recent struggle for a free and fair election in Bangladesh.
